line-heightfont-size/eg: font: 16px/normal arial;

## 
+ 
font-sizeline-heightline-heightfont-size

|element| font-size | line-height | line-height|
|------- |----------| ------------|--------------------|
|body    |16px      |  120%       |16px * 120% = 19.2px|
|h1      |32px      ||           19.2px|
|p       |16px      ||           19.2px|
|#footer |12px      ||           19.2px|

+ 
font-sizeline-height;font-size

|element| font-size | line-height | line-height|
|------- |----------| ------------|--------------------|
|body    |16px      |  20px       |          20px      |
|h1      |32px      ||        20px     |
|p       |16px      ||        20px     |
|#footer |12px      ||        20px     |

+ normal1.2
****font-sizefont-sizeline-height;font-size

|element| font-size | line-height | line-height|
|------- |----------| ------------|--------------------|
|body    |16px      |  normal     | 16px * 1.2= 19.2px|
|h1      |32px      |  normal     | 32px * 1.2= 38.4px|
|p       |16px      |  normal     | 16px * 1.2= 19.2px|
|#footer |12px      |  normal     | 11.2px * 1.2= 13.44px|

+ 
font-sizeline-height;font-size

|element| font-size | line-height | line-height|
|------- |----------| ------------|--------------------|
|body    |16px      |  1.5        | 16px * 1.5 = 24px|
|h1      |32px      |  1.5  | 32px * 1.5 = 48px|
|p       |16px      |  1.5  | 16px * 1.5 = 24px|
|#footer |12px      |  1.5  | 12px * 1.5 = 18px|
*line-height1.51.2
